channel.title: How to change client ip?
channel.description: sorry but i am still learning java codding. How do i change the client ip? My client keeps on saying error connecting to server thats why

item.title: How to change client ip?
item.dc:creator: @Skaffa Skaffa
item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

[quote=“Pandora7, post:1, topic:509763”]sorry but i am still learning java codding.
How do i change the client ip?
My client keeps on saying error connecting to server thats why[/quote]

[ol][li]Open up client[/li]
[li]Search : Client[/li]
[li]Open up Client.Java[/li]
[li]Ctrl + F : server.equals Or no-ip Or server = [/li]
[li]Change it to : 127.0.0.1, or the ip you want to use.[/li][/ol]

Goodluck

Read full topic
